Title: Dangerous Rescue
Text: Covert: You may KO a card from your hand or discard pile. If you do, rescue a Bystander.

Title: Mission Accomplished
Text: Draw a card.|Tech: Rescue a Bystander.

Title: Covert Operation
Text: You get +1 Attack for each Bystander in your Victory pile.

Title: Silent Sniper
Text: Defeat a Villain or Mastermind that has a Bystander.

Title: Avengers Assemble!
Text: You get +1 Recruit for each color of Hero you have.

Title: Perfect Teamwork
Text: You get +1 Attack for each color of Hero you have.

Title: Diving Block
Text: If you would gain a Wound, you may reveal this card and draw a card instead.

Title: A Day Unlike Any Other
Text: Avengers: You get +3 Attack for each other Avengers Hero you played this turn.

Title: Determination
Text: To play this card, you must discard a card from your hand.

Title: Optic Blast
Text: To play this card, you must discard a card from your hand.

Title: Unending Energy
Text: If a card effect makes you discard this card, you may return this card to your hand.

Title: X-Men United
Text: X-Men: You get +2 Attack for each other X-Men Hero you played this turn.

Title: Here, Hold This for a Second
Text: A Villain of your choice captures a Bystander.

Title: Oddball
Text: You get +1 Attack for each other Hero with an odd-numbered Cost you played this turn.
FlavorText: \"Hey, Abomination makes a pretty good babysitter.\

Title: Hey, Can I Get a Do-Over?
Text: If this is the first Hero you played this turn, you may discard the rest of your hand and draw four cards.

Title: Random Acts of Unkindness
Text: You may gain a Wound to your hand. Then each player passes a card from their hand to the player on their left.

Title: Mental Discipline
Text: Draw a card.
FlavorText: A natural telepath, Emma knows what you're thinking before you do.

Title: Shadowed Thoughts
Text: Covert: You may play the top card of the Villain Deck. If you do, you get +2 Attack.
FlavorText: Emma's days as a Villain are behind here...aren't they?

Title: Psychic Link
Text: Each player may reveal an X-Men Hero. Each player who does draws a card.

Title: Diamond Form
Text: Whenever you defeat a Villain or Mastermind this turn, you get +3 Recruit.
FlavorText: A secondary mutation allows Emma Frost to transform into pure diamond.

Title: Card Shark
Text: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an X-Men Hero, draw it.

Title: Stack the Deck
Text: Draw two cards. Then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

Title: Hypnotic Charm
Text: Reveal the top card of your deck. Discard it or put it back.|Instinct: Do the same thing to each other player's deck.

Title: High Stakes Jackpot
Text: Reveal the top card of your deck. You get + Attack equal to that card's cost.

Title: Quick Draw
Text: Draw a card.
FlavorText: Against robots, Hawkeye's first shot is a warning shot. In the face.

Title: Team Player
Text: Avengers: You get +1 Attack.
FlavorText: \"You line 'em up, and I'll knock 'em down...\

Title: Covering Fire
Text: Tech: Choose one: each other player draws a card or each other player discards a card.

Title: Impossible Trick Shot
Text: Whenever you defeat a Villain or Mastermind this turn, rescue three Bystanders.

Title: Growing Anger
Text: Strength: You get +1 Attack.
FlavorText: Don't make Hulk even mildly inconvenienced. You wouldn't like him when he's mildly inconvenienced...

Title: Unstoppable Hulk
Text: You may KO a Wound from your hand or discard pile. If you do, you get +2 Attack.

Title: Crazed Rampage
Text: Each player gains a Wound.
FlavorText: Hulk's rages tear everything apart: Enemies. Friends. Pants.

Title: Hulk Smash!
Text: Strength: You get +5 Attack.
FlavorText: \"PUNY HUMANS! HULK IS THE STRONGEST ONE THERE IS!\

Title: Endless Invention
Text: Draw a card.|Tech: Draw another card.

Title: Repulsor Rays
Text: Ranged: You get +1 Attack.
FlavorText: Repulsor ray technology has many peaceful applications. This is not one of them.

Title: Arc Reactor
Text: Tech: You get +1 Attack for each other Tech Hero you played this turn.

Title: Quantum Breakthrough
Text: Draw two cards.|Tech: Draw two more cards.

Title: Battlefield Promotion
Text: You may KO a S.H.I.E.L.D. Hero from your hand or discard pile. If you do, you may gain a S.H.I.E.L.D. Officer to your hand.

Title: High-Tech Weaponry
Text: Tech: You get +1 Attack.
FlavorText: Fury always budgets one extra prototype for his personal collection.

Title: Legendary Commander
Text: You get +1 Attack for each other S.H.I.E.L.D. Hero you played this turn.

Title: Pure Fury
Text: Defeat any Villain or Mastermind whose Attack is less than the number of S.H.I.E.L.D. Heroes in the KO pile.

Title: Borrowed Brawn
Text: Strength: You get +3 Attack.
FlavorText: When Rogue steals super strength, enemies get super scared.

Title: Energy Drain
Text: Covert: You may KO a card from your hand or discard pile. If you do, you get +1 Recruit.

Title: Play this card as a copy of another Hero you played this turn. This card is both Covert and the color you copy.
Text: Play this card as a copy of another Hero you played this turn. This card is both Covert and the color you copy.

Title: Steal Abilities
Text: Each player discards the top card of their deck. Play a copy of each of those cards.

Title: Astonishing Strength
Text: Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card costs 2 or less, draw it.

Title: Great Responsibility
Text: Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card costs 2 or less, draw it.

Title: Web-Shooters
Text: Rescue a Bystander.|Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card costs 2 or less, draw it.

Title: The Amazing Spider-Man
Text: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put any that cost 2 or less into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.

Title: Gathering Stormclouds
Text: Ranged: Draw a card.
FlavorText: Two little raindrops. Then two billion.

Title: Lightning Bolt
Text: Any Villain you fight on the Rooftops this turn gets -2 Attack.

Title: Spinning Cyclone
Text: You may move a Villain to a new city space. Rescue any Bystanders captured by that Villain. (If you move a Villain to a city space that already has Villain, swap them.)

Title: Tidal Wave
Text: Any Villain you fight on the Bridge this turn gets -2 Attack.|Ranged: The Mastermind gets -2 Attack this turn.

Title: Odinson
Text: Strength: You get +2 Recruit.
FlavorText: \"Whosoever holds the hammer, if he be worthy, shall possess the power of Thor.\

Title: Surge of Power
Text: If you made 8 or more Recruit this turn, you get +3 Attack.

Title: Call Lightning
Text: Ranged: You get +3 Attack.
FlavorText: Lightning never strikes twice. Thor never needs to.

Title: God of Thunder
Text: You can use Recruit as Attack this turn.
FlavorText: They call him the God of Thunder. His enemies better start praying.

Title: Healing Factor
Text: You may KO a Wound from your hand or discard pile. If you do, draw a card.

Title: Keen Senses
Text: Instinct: Draw a card.
FlavorText: The only thing scarier than Wolverine tracking you is Wolverine finding you.

Title: Frenzied Slashing
Text: Instinct: Draw two cards.
FlavorText: Some villains get torn apart by guilt. Others get torn apart by Wolverine.

Title: Berserker Rage
Text: Draw three cards.|Instinct: You get +1 Attack for each extra card you've drawn this turn.
